info.name: Whiteboard
info.description:
The official whiteboard app for Nextcloud. It allows users to create and share whiteboards with other users and collaborate in real-time.
**Whiteboard requires a separate collaboration server to work.** Please see the [documentation](https://github.com/nextcloud/whiteboard?tab=readme-ov-file#backend) on how to install it.
- 🎨 Drawing shapes, writing text, connecting elements - 📝 Real-time collaboration - 🖼️ Add images with drag and drop - 📊 Easily add mermaid diagrams - ✨ Use the Smart Picker to embed other elements from Nextcloud - 📦 Image export - 💪 Strong foundation: We use Excalidraw as our base library
info.author: Julius Härtl
